name: Rohit Gaddam
bio: I'm Rohith Undergradute Final Year student at Anurag University. I started my journey as a web developer and slowly expanded my skills to Flutter and Django Full Stack Developement. But My interest grew in Front-end Development and Cloud Computing. I've been Google Developer Student Club Lead for Year 2023-2024, The journey has been amazing throughout the year. I also Founded an Edtech startup 'Newbie Learning', We grew to 5000+ Developer Community within 2 months. We started to take Online Workshops, Webinars, Bootcamps to upskill our community. so now I'm studying in this area to complement my skills with development.
